subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The U.S. international Clint Dempsey scored a hat trick as Fulham beat Charlton, 4-0, in the English F.A. Cup.
snippet: The U.S. international Clint Dempsey scored a hat trick as Fulham beat Charlton, 4-0, in the English F.A. Cup.
